nodes.text: Star Wars: Attack of the Clones: Ship Schematics Punch Out Book

Star Wars: Attack of the Clones: Ship Schematics Punch Out Book is a punch-out model book published by Random House in April 2002 for the release of Star Wars: Episode II Attack of the Clones. The book contains five vehicles to build, ranging from the XJ-6 airspeeder to the Slave I, as well as a number of statistics for each vessel. The illustrations and papercraft engineering were made by Wayne Kalama.
